decision_conditions: <p>The proposed development does not benefit from the parameters of permitted development as set out under Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended) as permitted development rights to change the use of the building have been removed as part of an Article 4 Direction in relation to the site.<br></p>

<p>In the absence of a suitable undertaking to secure that the occupiers of the new residential units would not be able to apply for on street parking permits, the proposals would have an adverse impact on street parking conditions, highway safety,&nbsp; sustainable modes of transport and would contribute to congestion in the surrounding area&nbsp;contrary to Policies T1 and T4 of the London Plan (2021) and Hackney Local Plan Policies LP43 and LP45.&nbsp;Having regard to The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015, Part MA.2(2)(a), the change of use is not supported on the basis of adverse impact on on-street parking conditions and highway safety.<br></p>
description: Prior Approval (Class MA) to change use of part of second floor of building from commercial, business and service use (Class E)  to 7 x self-contained residential units (Class C3)
